snippet: Kenworthy, a freestyle skier, came out as gay, saying that hiding his sexuality during the 2014 Winter Olympics had soured his silver medal win.
abstract: American freestyle skier Gus Kenworthy, who won silver medal at 2014 Olypic Games, comes out as homosexual.
lead_paragraph: Kenworthy, a freestyle skier, came out as gay, saying that hiding his sexuality during the 2014 Winter Olympics had soured his silver medal win.

headline.main: Gus Kenworthy, Olympic Medalist, Says He’s Gay
